p: The diets were formulated to provide an average gain of 1.30 kg/day as recommended by the National Research Council (NRC) [ 16] with a 40:60 forage:concentrate ratio. Tifton hay ( Cynodon sp.) was cut (5 cm) and mixed with the concentrate, which consisted of ground whole corn, soybean meal, mineral mixture, urea soybean and condensed tannin extract ( Table 1). The diets were offered twice daily at 8:00 and 16:00 h with 10% refusals. Water was provided ad libitum.
